text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas | image_skyline = Santo Domingo, Ecuador.jpg |official_name = Province of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas |settlement_type = Province |image_flag = Bandera Provincia Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas.svg | image_shield = |image_map = Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas in Ecuador (+Galapagos).svg |coordinates_footnotes = |coordinates = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = Ecuador |seat_type = Capital |seat = Santo Domingo |parts_type = Cantons |parts = Santo Domingo La Concordia |leader_title = Provincial Prefect |leader_name = Edgar Geovanny Benítez Calva |established_title = Established |established_date = November 6, 2007 |named_for = Tsáchila |unit_pref = Metric |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = 3446.65 |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = |population_as_of = 2010 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total = 368013 |population_density_km2 = auto |timezone1 = ECT |utc_offset1 = -5 |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code_type = |area_code = |blank_name_sec2 = HDI (2017) |blank_info_sec2 = 0.737 · 9th |registration_plate = J |website = |footnotes = }} Santo Domingo de los TsáchilasSanto Domingo de los Tsáchilas at www.gptsachila.gob.ec is a province in the Republic of Ecuador. It was created in October 2007 from territory previously in the province of Pichincha. == Political division == Unique among the provinces of Ecuador, it has only two cantones, La Concordia and Santo Domingo, named after the city of Santo Domingo,Santo Domingo de los Colorados at www.santodomingo.gob.ec which is also the provincial capital. Canton Pop. (2001) Area (km²) Seat/Capital Santo Domingo 287,018 3,805 Santo Domingo La Concordia 24,924 325 La Concordia ==References== Category:Provinces of Ecuador
title: Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas Province
